titleStmt.title: Edinburgh 10. February 1647. Act for vplifting of ane moneths maintenance, for disbanding of these regiments horse and foot, that are not to be kept up for the service of the countrie.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Alex. Gibsone Cler. Regist.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
